meanings.definition: A type of plant known for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: Echinaceas are often used in herbal remedies for colds.
meanings.sent2: I planted some echinaceas in my garden to help with my health.
meanings.sent3: The echinaceas at the store looked like little green soldiers ready to fight off sickness.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists see echinaceas as nature's healing warriors.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple echinaceas stood proudly in the field, offering their healing powers to all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'echinacea'.
meanings.sent1: I bought a bunch of echinaceas to plant in my yard.
meanings.sent2: The echinaceas in my garden bloomed beautifully this year.
meanings.sent3: The echinaceas on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: In the meadow, the echinaceas danced in the breeze, celebrating their plural form.
meanings.sent5: The echinaceas in the vase brightened up the room with their cheerful presence.
